scripts.compileJs: browserify src/js/main.js -o build/js/main.js -t [ babelify ] && uglifyjs build/js/main.js -o build/js/min//main.js
scripts.compileLess: lessc src/less/main.less build/css/main.css && uglifycss build/css/main.css > build/css/min/main.css
scripts.start: npm run directory && npm run compileJs && npm run compileLess
